GeneDef.label: Wet Noodle
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are the definition of frail, struggling to lift even the lightest gear and finding meals a challenge to chew and digest. Their bodies tire quickly, and every burden feels heavier than it should.

GeneDef.label: Average Joe
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene possess the strength of the everyday wastelander, able to carry their own and survive on standard rations. They neither excel nor falter in feats of muscle or digestion.

GeneDef.label: Circus Strongman
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are built for the wastes, hauling heavy loads with ease and devouring even the toughest meals. Their bodies are resilient, and their stamina rarely fails them.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Strength
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are legends among survivors, able to lift, carry, and consume with unmatched power. Their strength is the stuff of pre-war myths, and nothing seems too heavy or too tough for them.

GeneDef.label: Senile Mole
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene stumble through the wastes, missing every subtle sound and shadow. Their senses are dulled, making ambushes and hidden dangers a constant threat.

GeneDef.label: Alert Coyote
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene see and hear as well as the next vault dweller, catching most details but sometimes missing the finer points. Their awareness is reliable, if unremarkable.

GeneDef.label: Sniper Hawk
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have eyes like a hawk and ears tuned to the faintest whisper. They spot threats and opportunities before others, making them invaluable scouts and sharpshooters.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Perception
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are the wasteland’s living sensors, detecting danger and secrets with supernatural clarity. No ambush or hidden cache escapes their notice.

GeneDef.label: Do Not Bend
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are fragile, succumbing quickly to wounds, toxins, and pain. The harsh realities of the wasteland take their toll, and survival is a daily struggle.

GeneDef.label: Stain Resistant
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene endure the wasteland’s hardships as well as most, surviving wounds and illness with no special advantage or disadvantage. Their bodies are steady, if not exceptional.

GeneDef.label: Bullet Proof
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene shrug off pain, toxins, and blood loss, surviving injuries that would fell lesser folk. Their stamina and resistance are a testament to their hardy lineage.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Endurance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are nearly unstoppable, enduring wounds, poisons, and agony with legendary grit. Their bodies seem built for survival, no matter the odds.

GeneDef.label: Misantrope
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene repel others with awkwardness and rough manners, struggling to make friends or influence anyone. Their words fall flat, and their looks do little to help.

GeneDef.label: Substitute Teacher
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene blend into the crowd, able to hold a conversation and get by, but rarely leaving a lasting impression. Their beauty and speech are unremarkable.

GeneDef.label: Movie Star
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene charm and persuade with ease, their words and looks opening doors and winning allies. They are the face of any group, and their presence is felt by all.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Charisma
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are wasteland celebrities, captivating crowds and swaying opinions with a glance or a word. Their beauty and eloquence are the stuff of legend.

GeneDef.label: Sub Brick
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene struggle with even simple concepts, learning slowly and teaching little. The mysteries of technology and science remain forever out of reach.

GeneDef.label: Knowledgeable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene grasp new ideas at a normal pace, able to learn and teach as well as most. Their minds are steady, if not brilliant.

GeneDef.label: Genius
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are quick thinkers, mastering skills and sharing knowledge with ease. Their intellect is a valuable asset in the wastes.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Intelligence
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are wasteland prodigies, solving problems and teaching others with genius-level insight. Their minds shape the future of civilization.

GeneDef.label: Walking Disaster
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene stumble and trip, moving slowly and awkwardly through the ruins. Their lack of coordination makes escape and pursuit a challenge.

GeneDef.label: Under Control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene move at a standard pace, able to keep up with the group but rarely outpace danger. Their reflexes are reliable, if not remarkable.

GeneDef.label: Acrobatic Marvel
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are nimble and quick, darting through the wasteland with impressive speed. Their reflexes and coordination are a cut above the rest.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Agility
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are legends of movement, outrunning threats and navigating obstacles with acrobatic grace. Their speed is matched only by their finesse.

GeneDef.label: 13 Black Cats
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene seem cursed, suffering frequent illness and slow recovery from wounds. Fortune rarely favors them, and danger is a constant companion.

GeneDef.label: Coin Flip
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene experience the usual ups and downs of wasteland life, neither blessed nor cursed. Their health and fortune are as unpredictable as the weather.

GeneDef.label: 21 Clover Leaf
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are favored by fate, dodging disease and healing quickly from injuries. Good things seem to happen to them more often than not.

GeneDef.label: Legendary Luck
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are wasteland legends, immune to misfortune and blessed with miraculous recoveries. Their luck is the envy of all who know them.
